content: WELLINGTON  July 1 Australian cancer treatment provider Icon Group said it expects its biggest investor  private equity firm Quadrant  to sell its 55 percent stake in an initial public offering by mid-2017  and said Icon is now worth A$1 billion ($745 million) in total.
name: ICON plc
title: Australia's Icon Group expects majority owner Quadrant to seek IPO by mid-2017

content: * Pfizer has right to extend term for up to an additional two years.
name: ICON plc
title: BRIEF-ICON signed new three-year agreement with Pfizer Inc.
